pkgmetadata.longdescription: # python_selenium_ctrlUnder construction! Not ready for use yet! Currently experimenting and planning!Developed by 2022Need to work with Selenium framework and pytest# Other Code# Procedure to publish to pypiReference: https://packaging.python.org/en/latest/tutorials/packaging-projects/#configuring-metadata1. Update pyproject.toml2. Install `build` and `twine` python package```shellpython -m pip install build twine```3. Build package```shellpython -m build#dist folder will appear tar.gz & .whl package```4. Publish to pypi (Need to have pypi account)```shellpython -m twine upload dist/*```
